import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { Media, Container, Row, Col, Image, Card, CardDeck} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Timeline from '@material-ui/lab/Timeline'; import TimelineItem from '@material-ui/lab/TimelineItem'; import TimelineSeparator from '@material-ui/lab/TimelineSeparator'; import TimelineConnector from '@material-ui/lab/TimelineConnector'; import TimelineContent from '@material-ui/lab/TimelineContent'; import TimelineDot from '@material-ui/lab/TimelineDot'; import TimelineOppositeContent from '@material-ui/lab/TimelineOppositeContent'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Rating from '@material-ui/lab/Rating'; import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box'; import './Styles.css' const About=()=> { const [value, setValue] = React.useState(2); return (

Profile

I am a junior engineering graduate in Electronics. I am passionate about learning and exploring new technologies of different areas like machine learning, web developpement etc. Furthermore I would like to apply these technologies to electronic systems to do something really cool and helpful to us.

I live in France now. I love reading, travelling, skiing, skating and adventure.

Education
    2017 - 2020
    École Polytechnique de l'Université de Tours, France

    Master/Ingénieur - Electronic system for medical devices

    The education covered from hardware to software including Component and Circuit Design and Simulation, Sensor Analysis and Applications, and Embedded Systems Applications.

    2014 - 2017
    Northeastern University, China

    Bachelor - Communications Engineering

    The education covered basic circuit knowledge including principles of circuit, analog and digital circuits and also basic knowledge of computer science like computer network, data structure, object oriented programming, principle and application of microcomputer. Furthermore, it allowed me to build my knowledge about communications engineering including signal and linear system, digital signal processing, electromagnetic fields and waves, communication electronic circuit etc.

Experiences
